name: Best Friendsim
description:
Have you ever thought, "oh gee, it kind of sucks that mc doesnt seem to actually want to spend time with their friends"? well then youre in luck bc this fansim is entirely based around that concept! starting with everyones favourite tick queen

volume 1- ardata

volume 2- ????

stay tuned for more volumes and more friends

majority of art and writing - hostilemuppet.tumblr.com

original assets are still credited in the credits section and i am by no means attempting to claim ownership of anything from the original game
